title: Black Sabbath - Master of Reality
content:
Ignoring the wave effect what is this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130225083748im_/http:/typophile.com/files/B000002KDO.01.LZZZZZZZ.jpg)
author: theglow

comments.content:
Looks like it was a descendent of [Kabel Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20130225083748/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kabel/black/testdrive.html).. \*shudder\*..

_whew, it's been a while.. how've you guys been?_
